00019 void PredatorManager::flushPredators()
00020 {
00021     movedPredators.clear();
00022     stateChangedPredators.clear();
00023 
00024     SimulationManager::get()->getPreyManager()->flushPredators();
00025 }

00027 void PredatorManager::registerPrey(Prey* prey)
00028 {
00029     listeningPrey.push_back(prey);
00030 }
00031 
00032 void PredatorManager::removePrey(Prey* prey)
00033 {
00034     listeningPrey.remove(prey);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void PredatorManager::predatorStarved(Predator* pred)
00038 {
00039     movedPredators.remove(pred);
00040     stateChangedPredators.remove(pred);
00041 
00042     SimulationManager::get()->getPreyManager()->removePredator(pred);
00043 }
00044 
00045 void PredatorManager::predatorAttacked(Predator* attacker, Prey* target)
00046 {
00047     ReportManager::get()->getReportSection(attacker->getName() + attacker->getSpecies())->addMessage("\t" + SimulationManager::get()->getSimulationTime() + " Attacked Prey: " + target->getName());
00048     ReportManager::get()->getReportSection(target->getName() + target->getSpecies())->addMessage("\t" + SimulationManager::get()->getSimulationTime() + " Attacked and Killed by: " + attacker->getName());
00049     SimulationManager::get()->getPreyManager()->preyAttacked(target);
00050     SimulationManager::get()->getActiveEnvironment()->killPrey(target);
00051 }
00052 
00053 void PredatorManager::predatorStateChanged(Predator* predator)
00054 {
00055     stateChangedPredators.push_back(predator);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void PredatorManager::predatorMoved(Predator* predator)
00059 {
00060     movedPredators.push_back(predator);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void PredatorManager::update()
00064 {
00065     list<Prey*>::const_iterator iter;
00066     for (iter = listeningPrey.begin(); iter != listeningPrey.end(); ++iter)
00067         (*iter)->update(movedPredators, stateChangedPredators);
00068 
00069     movedPredators.clear();
00070     stateChangedPredators.clear();
00071 }
